messages.title: THE CHOICE FOR OUR NHS:
messages.content: A BETTER FUTURE FOR OUR NHS WITH THE LIB DEMS OR LABOUR WHO ARE TOO WEAK AND DIVIDED TO FIGHT FOR OUR NHS

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats have pledged to increase income tax by a penny for every earner to fund a £6bn-a-year cash injection for the NHS and social care.

issues.health: The Liberal Democrats have pledged to increase income tax by a penny for every earner to fund a £6bn-a-year cash injection for the NHS and social care.
